title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 187.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 187.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part: (a) Commissioner means the Industrial

Commissioner of the State of New York. (b) Work training program means training
program for minors 16 and 17 years of age conducted by a non-profit
organization or which is publicly funded in whole or in part and which includes
safety instruction and training in the use of machinery, equipment and
devices. (c) Non-profit
organization means an organization operated exclusively for religious, charitable or educational purposes, no part of the net earnings of which inures
to the benefit of any private shareholder or individual, including a public
school. (d) Organization includes a
non-profit organization and any entity conducting a work training program which
is publicly funded in whole or in part. (e) Minor means a person 16 or 17 years of
age. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
187.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
